title: How to Put Google Images in Email

steps.headline: Find the picture you want to put on the mail.
View the picture at full size.
Highlight the address on the right and copy it.
Open up a new mail message.
Open the html file.
steps.description: Copy the image on the file.

steps.headline: Paste it on the content of your mail.
Write your message, and you have a picture on your mail!

text: Find the picture you want to put on the mail. View the picture at full size. Right click on it. Click on Properties. Find where it says: Address (URL). Highlight the address on the right and copy it. Open up a new mail message. Open notepad. Write these on the notepad: Save as html file. Open the html file. Copy the image on the file. Paste it on the content of your mail. Write your message, and you have a picture on your mail!
sentences: Find the picture you want to put on the mail.

Write these on the notepad: Save as html file.
Copy the image on the file.
Paste it on the content of your mail.
Write your message, and you have a picture on your mail!
